text: Kuma shi ne wanda Ya halicci sammai da ƙasa a cikin kwanaki shida, kuma Al'arshinSa ya kasance akan ruwa, dõmin Ya jarrabã ku, wannan ne daga cikinku mafi kyãwon aiki. Kuma haƙĩƙa idan ka ce: "Lalle kũ waɗanda ake tãyarwa ne a bãyan mutuwa," haƙĩƙa waɗanda suka kãfirta sunã cẽwa: "Wannan bai zama ba fãce sihiri bayyananne."
